name: Seo Backlinks Saver
author: Infolio

sections.description:
If you are optimizing your site for the search engines, this plugin you don’t need to write 301 redirect code in .htaccess it will automatically redirect any 301 link to home page.

  • No need to changing the Permalinks Structure for the whole site
  • Buyers advocate melbourne
  • Property management melbourne
  • Property investment melbourne
  • Buyers agent melbourne

Important Note: The redirection will not work then Change / Update WordPress default permalinks structure.
sections.installation:
Manual installation:

  1. Upload “seo-backlinks-saver.zip” to your “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Unzip the folder. (You may delete the .zip copy afterwards)
  3. Inside your WordPress admin, activate the plugin in the “Plugins” menu.
  4. Enjoy! No more funky configurations needed.

Automatic Installation:

  1. Inside your WordPress admin, go to “Plugins” >> “Add New” and search for “Seo Backlinks Saver”.
  2. From the search results, look for “Seo Backlinks Saver”, then click the “Install Now” link below it.
  3. Activate the plugin in the “Plugins” menu.
  4. Enjoy! No more funky configurations needed.

Important Note: The redirection will not work then Change / Update WordPress default permalinks structure.

short_description: This Plugin is used to all non-existent pages of your site by redirect them to 301 with home page automatically.
